favourite.article: Oh Lord I love You. Grant me a heart that single and true. Thank You for opening my eyes and turned me to You. Reach me with Your mercy and Your grace. Amen!
I thank You my Lord Jesus Christ for You have visited me with Your mercy and Your grace. Thank You for Lord, I pray Your visit all Your Children around the world.
Grant me a true and pure heart Lord to love You and follow You each day.

Lord take my life.
Lord thank you so much for being here.
I'm so blessed to have You.

I'm so touched by this hymn. Grant me oh Lord, a heart that's single and true. And a daily life that's living just for you! Day by day we need to Absorb Him, Recieve Him and let Him grow in us everyday. The growth of the Body of Christ is the Building up of the Body of Christ. Hallelujah! For Christ and the Church.

I am so blessed. Lord grant me a heart to be true as this song. I have no control over my tears. Thank You so My Friend Jesus. I am what I am Because you have been a true Friend to me though a feeble friend like me has always been disappointing to you. Thank You My Friend Jesus.

What really spoke to me in this hymn are the lines: Grant me, Lord, a heart That’s single and true. And a daily life that’s living just by You.
Amen and Amen! God is so good. A great big thank you to hymnal.net for all this great work you are doing to encourage and bless so many of God's people.
Just as Mary poured her love out, O Lord, I would too. Grant me, Lord, a heart that's single and true. And a daily life that's living just by You.

Oh Lord Jesus! Thank You for welling up in me each day! You are so faithful. Oh Lord, thank You that we may turn to You. Thank you for providing us with grace throughout our trials. Thank you for becoming so real to us.
I like this song: firstly it can comfort my mind and my soul, then I feel the peace in my inner heart. Secondly it gives me power and courage to face troubles in life.
